entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
